title: What happened to OFA: Mirror Mode?

embed.description: KARTHUS x10 in One for All Mirror Mode League of Legends. *One for All: Mirror Mode Karthus gameplay in League of Legends. Like+Comment+Subscribe! http://bit.ly/1a1DCOI Horse Racing in LoL:http://youtu.be/B2fkg0N8zrM 10x Anivia Walls: http://youtu.be/-At-gCMQnXY Mirror Mode Soraka: http://youtu.be/jpYiQafe3Q8 Mirror Mode Evelynn: http://youtu.be/3yPSUrM_2kI Mirror Mode Fizz: http://youtu.be/JRH71rPEfgs Mirror Mode Kog'Maw: http://youtu.be/v5e3Ym1nt8Q Official Thread: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/one-all-back-twist "One For All is back with a twist!

body:
The link is an example video of the said game mode.

What happened to this? I really loved it back in 2014.

Also, Nemesis Draft?
